thread.title: U.S. sold oil with high levels of dangerous chemical

title: U.S. sold oil with high levels of dangerous chemical
text:
U.S. sold oil with high levels of dangerous chemical 11:05am BST - 01:41 
Three firms that bought oil last year from U.S. emergency stockpiles raised concerns about dangerous levels of a poisonous chemical in the cargoes, according to internal Department of Energy emails and shipping documents reviewed by Reuters.   
Three firms that bought oil last year from U.S. emergency stockpiles raised concerns about dangerous levels of a poisonous chemical in the cargoes, according to internal Department of Energy emails and shipping documents reviewed by Reuters.  //reut.rs/2pTdVeq
